nodes.text: Brimon Yarar was a member of the anti-alien Human League, referred to within the organization as "General." He had dark skin and dark hair. He was in charge of the archaeological dig on Corellia for the ancient underground repulsor; during a tour of the dig, young Jacen, Jaina, and Anakin Solo discovered the repulsor, which Yarar's men had overlooked. Later he informed Thrackan Sal-Solo of Drall's repulsor being activated.
